item.title: Microsoft Windows Shell Command Injection - MS12-048
item.description: CVE-2012-0175 Background Windows File Association allows an application to define a handler that should be called for each operation on a specific file type. For example, WinRAR registers the file type .RAR in the following manner: The Open action defined for this file type dictates how the handler should be called upon opening the file. The command that will be executed for this example of WinRAR is: "C:\Program Files\WinRAR\WinRAR.exe" "%1"
